title: Character and Other History Schema
description: Reusable schema for character assessment, covering war crimes, terrorist activities, extremist activities, and person of good character across UK immigration applications
x-llmHint: Character and other history information. Match: police certificates, criminal record checks, court documents, bankruptcy records, questionnaire responses about war crimes, terrorist activities, security concerns.

StandardWarCrimes.description: War crimes declarations - involvement or suspicion of war crimes, crimes against humanity, or genocide

warCrimesInvolved.description: In either peace or war time have you ever been involved in, or suspected of involvement in, war crimes, crimes against humanity, or genocide?

warCrimesInvolvedDetails.description: Details about war crimes involvement if answered Yes

termsWarCrimes.description: I have read all of the information about war crimes, crimes against humanity and genocide, including the guidance

StandardTerroristActivities.description: Terrorist activities, organisations and views declarations

terroristActivitiesInvolved.description: Have you ever been involved in, supported or encouraged terrorist activities in any country?

terroristActivitiesInvolvedDetails.description: Details about terrorist activities involvement if answered Yes

terroristOrganisationMember.description: Have you ever been a member of, or given support to, an organisation which has been concerned in terrorism?

terroristOrganisationMemberDetails.description: Details about terrorist organisation membership if answered Yes

terroristViewsExpressed.description: Have you, by any means or medium, expressed views that justify or glorify terrorist violence, or that may encourage others to commit terrorist or other serious criminal acts?

terroristViewsExpressedDetails.description: Details about terrorist views expressed if answered Yes

termsTerroristActivities.description: I have read all of the information about terrorist activities, organisations and views, including the guidance

extremistOrganisationMember.description: Have you ever been a member of, or given support to, an organisation which is or has been concerned with extremism?

extremistOrganisationMemberDetails.description: Details about extremist organisation membership if answered Yes

extremistViewsExpressed.description: Have you, by any means or medium, expressed any extremist views?

extremistViewsDetails.description: Details about extremist views expressed if answered Yes

termsExtremistActivities.description: I have read all of the information about extremist organisations and views, including the guidance

StandardPersonOfGoodCharacter.description: Person of good character declarations - dangerous activities, character concerns, and other information

dangerousNonUKGovernmentWork.description: Have you, as part of your employment or otherwise, undertaken paid or unpaid activity on behalf of a non-UK government which you know to be dangerous to the interest or national security of the UK or its allies?

dangerousNonUKGovernmentWorkDetails.description: Details about dangerous non-UK government work if answered Yes

goodCharacterConcerns.description: Have you ever engaged in any other activities which might indicate that you may not be considered to be a person of good character?

goodCharacterConcernsDetails.description: Details about good character concerns if answered Yes

otherCharacterInformation.description: Is there any other information about your character or behaviour which you would like to make us aware of?

otherCharacterInformationDetails.description: Details about other character information if provided

CriminalityAndCharacter.description: Combined character assessment - war crimes, terrorism, extremism, and good character declarations
